fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A feature in last Saturday’s Review was edited to suggest that the Dying Swan was the most famous solo in Swan Lake. The Dying Swan is a separate short solo, not part of the original Swan Lake ballet (All frozen pain, 25 November, page 14). • Step one of a recipe for cinnamon-almond meringue stars involved making the meringue, and said to set aside 12 tablespoons of the mixture to be used later in the recipe to top the cookies. As a reader said, that would leave very little for the cookie dough. That should have said about three heaped tbsp (What’s Kuchen?, 25 November, page 4, Cook). • Other recently corrected articles include: Christians should pray for Prince George to be gay, says minister As an actor, Meghan Markle comes from a long line of trailblazing women Refugee MP Golriz Ghahraman on love, loathing and entering New Zealand politics Historians working towards a full imperial reckoning for Britain
